summary: Hercules and Deianeira go in search of fire to save the world from cold. All the world's fire are fast going out. Hercules' father, Zeus, is on hand to help (and sometime hinder) the two.
cast: Kevin Sorbo|Anthony Quinn|Tawny Kitaen|Kevin Atkinson|Stephanie Barrett|Christopher Brougham|Nell Weatherly|Simone Kessell|Alexander Gandar|Joseph Greer|Kerry Gallagher|John Watson|Sharon Tyrell|Mark Ferguson|Yvonne Lawley|Zo Hartley|Geoff Snell|Mark Newnham|Philip Gillis|Martyn Sanderson|Lisa Chappell|Kim Michalis|Leticia Bridges|Amy Morrison|Patrick Morrison|Joy Watson
title: Hércules y el círculo de fuego
